import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Grid, Cell } from "react-mdl"; import Education from "./education"; import Experience from "./experience"; import Skills from "./skills"; import FadeIn from "react-fade-in"; import ProfilePic from "./images/profile.png" class Resume extends Component { render() { return (

Max Clayton

Programmer

I am currently going to school for my Bachelor's degree in Web Design and Development. I am on track to graduate in the Spring of 2022. {" "}

Email

maxclayton07@gmail.com

Web

maxclayton.github.io

Education

Experience

Skills
); } } export default Resume;
